__data__.text: This is Crowd Agent at 2025年02月13日（星期四）09:30 Plan：Wake up at 6；Move to CHIJMES plazas at 7:00；Wait orderly according to guidance at 8:00；Observe crowd flow and adjust position at 9:30；Continue moving and waiting as per event schedule at 11:00；Take a short break in a suitable spot at 12:00；Follow on-site guidance for movement at 13:00；Adjust position based on crowd density at 14:30；Remain in designated area for event activities at 16:00；Observe and adjust movement again at 17:30；Prepare for departure following event conclusion at 19:00；Return home safely at 20:00
